channel.title: Updates on teukka.tech
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on teukka.tech

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Making the switch from alacritty to kitty and it’s really great to have the multiplexer built into the terminal!

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Wondering if there are any guides out there for using lua for build scripting. Seems like it would be faster than spinning up a nodevm, easier to read and reason about that monster bash scripts, and less maintenance than a project written in something like Go or Rust.

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Been reading Catherine Liu‘s excellent book, Virtue Hoarders and it captures a lot of my own sentiment about politics and culture in a fast paced and exciting style.

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Thinking about the best way to integrate my existing tiddlywiki into my current website… Converting everything is a ton of work :(

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: I wonder what a bookclub over micropub/sub might look like, or how xanadu like inclusions could be implemented on the indieweb.

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: I’ve enjoyed using Hugo to build out my personal website. It makes it so easy to just focus on the fun stuff without worrying about all the tooling you need to generate really great static sites. It’s also super fast!

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Really amazing feeling when you finally get everything working and can close all your tabs! Getting closer to a great indieweb home on the internet.

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Testing my new “serverless” micropub server integration!

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: quick update to test vercel integration again
